column4: I have an Intel P4 2.4 GHz, 768 DDR RAM and a nVidia GeForce MX440.. can anyone tell me if I can run the desktop effects (I'm mostly interested in the cube) :D
a GeForce MX440 does not likely support it, but i'm not 100% sure
i switched a month ago from xp to ubuntu and i never looked back :-)
